reviews.review: it is really nice game scary but cool

Great game fun to play with friends.

If you play killer and you act like a b*tch and camp n sh*t I hope from the bottom of my heart that someone very very close to you gets a brain tumor that explodes in their head.
The gameplay loop if kind of fun but it doesn't make up for how ugly and at points poorly made the whole thing is.

Where do I start? The cheating is horribly out of hand. It's every other game someone is using a cheat of some kind or another. I tried to call it out in the forums and got banned within 7 minutes of posting. The game is extremely survivor sided even though it's a 4v1 so you'd think that the killers would be far stronger but that isn't even remotely the case. This game is a cash grab and no changes are ever gonna be made to balance it. Don't waste your time or money on it.

É muito viciante esse jogo. No começo você vai jogar só um pouco, mas quando você menos espera, já está jogando quase todo dia. Infelizmente sempre tem aqueles típicos jogadores tóxicos e mal educados como qualquer outro jogo co-op online, mas recomendo você jogar com amigos, tanto em personalizadas quanto as partidas normais!

I have a love-hate relationship with this game.

El juego es sin duda, mucho mejor de lo que era hace 3-4 años, lo que habla muy bien de sí mismo, siendo que antes estaba mal balanceado y habían muchas perks muy inútiles o muy Op's ahora todo se encuentra en un estado mucho mas agradable. Sin contar el hecho de que se compraron servidores y ahora podés jugar a menos de 180ms, cosa que era normal.

TL;DR: Dead by Daylight evolucionó a través de cambios pequeños y sigue haciéndolo, sin duda para bien. Ahora sí que llevan un Pretty good job so far.

Si vale la pena comprarlo? Más que antes, ya que ahora todos los dlc pueden ser obtenidos de forma gratuita, siendo que en una semana de vicio eres capaz de juntar para comprar un personaje de dlc, que es prácticamente añadirle más horas al juego.

The simplicity and focus on teamwork aswell as outplay potential can be great. However some exploits can give the killer a very bad time. Getting into higher ranks doesnt take long, but when you are there the only difference is the lack of originality. In higher ranks the game is heavily influenced by meta perks/add-ons, that is the only thing that sets it apart, aside from overall game knowledge of course. All in all the game is  nice and I have been enjoying it on both the PS4 and PC.

運営・開発側がキラーエアプなので8:2くらいでサバイバー(以下鯖)有利の調整が行われているため
一般人４人が殺人鬼から逃げるゲームのはずがエアプ調整により超人４人で殺人鬼をいじめて煽るゲームになっています

度重なる鯖の煽りや運営開発の鯖優遇によってキラーの人口は減少していくため、鯖のマッチング待機時間がキラーに比べると長いです

運営・開発のエアプ適当調整や糞ゲーを楽しみたい人
友達と一緒に鯖で遊びたいって人には購入をおすすめします

If your looking for a review on this game you've come to the wrong place, but if your looking for an outstanding pie recipe you've come to the right place.

Ingredients:
1. 6 tablespoons unsalted butter
2. 1/2 cup white sugar
3. 1/2 cup brown sugar
4. 1/4 cup water
5. 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
6. 1 pinch salt
7. 5 apples - peeled, cored and sliced
8. 1 pastry for double-crust pie

Directions:
1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
2. Combine butter, white sugar, brown sugar, water, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remove from heat and set aside.
3. Roll out half the pastry to fit a 9-inch pie plate. Place bottom crust in pie plate; pour in apple slices.
4. Roll out top crust into a 10-inch circle. Cut into 8 (1-inch) wide strips with a sharp paring knife or pastry wheel. Weave the pastry strips, one at a time, into a lattice pattern. Fold the ends of the lattice strips under the edge of the bottom crust and crimp to seal.
5. Pour butter-sugar mixture over top of pie, coating the lattice, and allowing any remaining sauce to drizzle through the crust.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and bake until the crust is golden brown, the caramel on the top crust is set, and the apple filling is bubbling, 35 to 40 more minutes. Allow to cool completely before slicing

Müşterisini kaybetmek için bu kadar uğraşan başka bir oyun görmedim.
+++
Oyuna gelen güncellemeler self destruction odaklı ama arkadaşlarınla girince sarıyor.
+++
Bir oyun düşünün ki 3,5gb'lık güncelleme gelince 4,5gb dosya siliniyor. Dün 3 arkadaş güncelleme yaptık bende ve 1 arkadaşımda 4,5gb , diğer arkadaşımda 9gb eksik dosya çıktı.
+++
her oyuna girişinizde sizi oyundan atmasına rağmen hala oyundan soğumazsanız verdiğiniz paraya değebilir.
